hero.title: Wire Flattening Machine
hero.subtitle: Transform Your Production Economics
hero.description: Convert standard 8mm wire rod into precise 11.5 x 3mm flat steel, reducing raw material costs by up to 50% while streamlining your production process

specifications.title: Wire Flattening Machine
specifications.description:
The YILSA Wire Flattening Machine revolutionizes wheel weight production economics through purpose-built design. Unlike general-purpose flattening equipment, our system is specifically engineered for wheel weight manufacturing, offering superior cost-efficiency and precise dimensional control.

Designed for seamless integration with our wheel weight production line, this specialized machine directly processes 8mm wire rod into production-ready 11.5 x 3mm flat steel, eliminating costly intermediate steps and reducing raw material expenses by up to 50%.

table.dimensions: Machine Dimensions: 80cm Width x 120cm Length x 180cm Height

description.title: Purpose-Built Innovation
description.subtitle: Maximizing Production Efficiency
description.intro:
Our purpose-built wire flattening system delivers three key economic benefits:

Raw Material Cost Reduction: Utilizes readily available 8mm wire rod
Process Optimization: Eliminates intermediate production steps
Direct Integration: Feeds directly into the wheel weight production line

economic.title: Economic Advantages
economic.description:
Our purpose-built wire flattening system delivers three key economic benefits:

Raw Material Cost Reduction: Utilizes readily available 8mm wire rod
Process Optimization: Eliminates intermediate production steps
Direct Integration: Feeds directly into the wheel weight production line

technical.title: Technical Excellence
technical.description: The machine's precision-engineered design ensures consistent output quality while maintaining high production speeds. The robust 11 kW AC motor system delivers reliable performance, processing up to 16 meters per minute of raw material into precisely dimensioned flat steel.

list.processing: Direct Processing: 8mm wire rod to 11.5 x 3mm flat steel
list.cost: Cost Reduction: Up to 50% raw material savings
list.integration: Simple Integration: Compatible with existing production lines

integration.title: Integration Features
integration.description: The system's compact design requires minimal floor space while offering seamless integration with your wheel weight production line. The streamlined material path eliminates the need for additional handling equipment, reducing both capital investment and operational complexity.
